title: Assault on the Sepik
creator_credit: Ross Mackenzie, Nicholas Alexander and CSIRO
brief_description: The story of a CSIRO program in which a black weevil was introduced into New Guinea’s Sepik River in an attempt to control one of the world’s worst water weeds, Salvinia molesta. Narrated by John Stanton.
description: The story of a CSIRO program in which a black weevil was introduced into New Guinea’s Sepik River in an attempt to control one of the world’s worst water weeds, Salvinia molesta. Narrated by John Stanton.
